system.description: You move objects or creatures by concentration. You can move an object weighing up to 25 pounds per caster level (max 375 lb at 15th level) at 20 feet per round. You can move an unattended object, or you can move an attended object (Reflex negates) or a creature (Will negates). Alternatively, you can use telekinesis as a combat maneuver: bull rush, disarm, grapple, or trip. Resolve the maneuver as normal except that you use your caster level in place of your base attack bonus and your key ability modifier in place of Strength. You can only move one object at a time. You must Concentrate to maintain the effect.
system.savingThrow: Will negates (object) or Reflex negates (object); see text
